Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;f4 Energy Rifle^reset; to the scientist.

Texts.Chs: 我被这个星球的一切吸引住了！我一直想探索这一切，但是世界却充满了各种危险！所以你能为我制作一把^orange;F4能量步枪^reset;吗？它将会帮助我生存下去，我会给你足够多的奖励的。
Texts.Eng: I keep getting devoured on this planet! It sucks! Could you build me an ^orange;F4 Energy Rifle^reset; to help me survive? I'd compensate you well enough...

Texts.Chs: 我不是科学家...所以，请拿着这个。
Texts.Eng: I'm not much of a scientist... so umm take this.
